Title: The Brave
Writer: Gregory McDonald (novel), Paul McCudden (screenplay), Johnny Depp (screenplay), D.P. Depp (screenplay)
Actors: Johnny Depp, Marlon Brando, Marshall Bell, Elpidia Carrillo
Plot: An unemployed alcoholic Native American Indian lives on a trailer park with his wife and two children. Convinced that he has nothing to offer this world, he agrees to be tortured to death by a gang of rednecks in return for $50,000.
